content:
That's a great idea! Preparing your snacks on Sundays can help you stay on track with your fitness goals and ensure that you have healthy options available throughout the week. It's also a great way to save time during the week when you might be busy with work or other activities.

By preparing your snacks on Sundays, you can:

1. **Save time**: By preparing your snacks in advance, you can save time during the week when you might be busy with work or other activities.
2. **Stay on track**: Having healthy snacks available can help you stay on track with your fitness goals and avoid unhealthy impulse snacks.
3. **Fuel your body**: Preparing your snacks on Sundays can help you fuel your body for your strength-training workout on Fridays and support your overall fitness goals.
4. **Reduce stress**: Knowing that you have healthy snacks prepared can reduce stress and anxiety about what to eat during the week.

Remember to store your snacks properly to keep them fresh and enjoy them throughout the week. You can also consider preparing other healthy meals or snacks on Sundays, such as overnight oats or salads, to keep you fueled and satisfied throughout the week.

Good luck with your snack prep, and I hope you enjoy your strength-training workout on Fridays!
